## Here is some inline code `r 1 + 1`

````{r starwars-plot, fig.cap = "A ggplot of starwars stuff"}
library(tidyverse)

starwars %>%
  filter(species == "Human") %>%
  
ggplot() + 
aes(x = height, 
    y = mass) + 
  geom_point()
````

We can see in Figure  \@ref(fig:starwars-plot)


````{r starwars-tbl}
starwars %>%
  filter(species == "Human") %>%
  select(name,
         height,
         mass,
         homeworld) %>%
  knitr::kable(caption = "A knitr knable table of star wars data")
````


We can see in Table \@ref(tab:starwars-tbl)
